mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Bushrod Washington to George Washington, Mount Vernon, 1797 October 20
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Washington, Bushrod, 1762-1829
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Bushrod Washington answers George Washington's legal queries dealing with Thomas Pearson's suit concerning land sold by his late brother Simon Pearson to Washington and others in 1763 [see letter, George Washington to Bushrod W., Oct. 9, 1797] -- Bushrod will take the case should it go to a higher court -- Gen. Marshall may know something further about the case, as Bushrod met a man named Pearson at Marshall's office recently. Autograph letter signed, docketed by George Washington, postmarked "Richmond Oct. 20 1797," laminated, watermark (crown over heraldic shield). | Name on original manuscript appears as "B. Washington". | Papers of George Washington - Reel#2
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Washington, George, 1732-1799
